name: Friend Ship
description:
A two-player co-op action shooting game created by students.
The setting is on a ship floating on the vast ocean. Let's work together to repel the large army of sharks that attack from 360 degrees!
Don't forget to reload and keep attacking, and when the gauge fills up, you'll have a chance to turn the tables with a giant firework!
Let's increase your score and confidence while watching each other's movements and helping each other!

  • Multiplayer

How to operate
As shown in the basic buttons
Xbox controller standards

B:Decision
A:Cancel
Start: Pause
B: Gimmick action
X: Reload
R: Shooting
L:Lock on
